title: 06/24/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/24/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses Trae Young's run through the playoffs, the Hawks winning game 1 over the Bucks and what this tell us about the Eastern Conference since LeBron James signed with the Lakers. He agrees with Steve Kerr saying Kevin Durant is more talented than Michael Jordan even though MJ is still the GOAT. He believes one young quarterback in the NFL is in line to get a contract extension, but the team should hold off on that. Plus, longtime NBA veteran Olden Polynice joins the show to tell Colin why the Clippers could be in big trouble tonight down 0-2 to the Suns in the Western Conference Finals.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
